sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Activity, TrendingUp, Zap, AlertCircle, CheckCircle, Clock, RefreshCw, Play, Pause, Settings } from 'lucide-react'; import { api } from '../services/api'; const Dashboard = ({ systemStatus, onRefresh }) => { const [refreshing, setRefreshing] = useState(false); const handleRefresh = async () => { setRefreshing(true); await onRefresh(); setRefreshing(false); }; if (!systemStatus) { return (
); } const { overview, running_bots, connected_exchanges, last_updated } = systemStatus; return (
{/* Header */}

Trading Bot Dashboard

Last updated: {new Date(last_updated).toLocaleString()}

{/* Status Cards */}
{/* Bot Status */}

Running Bots

{overview.bots.running}/{overview.bots.total}

Manage Bots →
{/* Exchange Status */}

Connected Exchanges

{overview.exchanges.connected}/{overview.exchanges.total}

Manage Exchanges →
{/* System Status */}

System Status

Operational

All systems online
{/* Performance */}

Active Strategies

{Object.keys(overview.bots.strategy_breakdown || {}).length}

Strategies running
{/* Running Bots Section */}

Running Bot Instances

View All
{running_bots && running_bots.length > 0 ? (
{running_bots.map((bot) => (

{bot.strategy}

{bot.symbol} on {bot.exchanges.join(', ')}

{bot.status} {new Date(bot.start_time).toLocaleTimeString()}
))}
) : (

No bots are currently running

Start a bot →
)}
{/* Exchange Status Section */}

Exchange Connections

View All
{connected_exchanges && connected_exchanges.length > 0 ? (
{connected_exchanges.slice(0, 6).map((exchange) => (

{exchange.name}

{exchange.status === 'connected' ? ( ) : ( )}

Type: {exchange.exchange_type}

Markets: {exchange.market_count.toLocaleString()}

))}
) : (

No exchanges are connected

Configure exchanges →
)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Start New Bot Test Exchanges
); }; export default Dashboard;
